Enum Class TransformChangeEvent.Reason

Object
Enum<TransformChangeEvent.Reason>
Reason
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Transform­Change­Event​.Reason>, Constable
Enclosing class:
Transform­Change­Event
public static enum TransformChangeEvent.Reason extends Enum<TransformChangeEvent.Reason>
The reason why the "objective to display" transform changed. It may be because of canvas initialization, or an adjustment for a change of CRS without change in the viewing area, or a navigation for viewing a different area.
Since:
1.3
See Also:
  • Transform­Change­Event​.get­Reason()

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    ASSIGNMENT
    A new value has been assigned, overwriting the previous values.
    CRS_CHANGE
    A new value has been automatically computed for preserving the viewing area after a change of CRS.
    DISPLAY_NAVIGATION
    A relative change has been applied in units of display device (typically pixel units).
    GRID_GEOMETRY_CHANGE
    A new value has been assigned as part of a wider set of changes.
    INTERIM
    A relative interim change has been applied but is not yet reflected in the "objective to display" transform.
    OBJECTIVE_NAVIGATION
    A relative change has been applied in units of the objective CRS (for example in metres).

  • Enum Constant Details

    • GRID_GEOMETRY_CHANGE

      public static final TransformChangeEvent.Reason GRID_GEOMETRY_CHANGE
      A new value has been assigned as part of a wider set of changes. It typically happens when the canvas is initialized.
      See Also:
      • Canvas​.set­Grid­Geometry(Grid­Geometry)

    • CRS_CHANGE

      public static final TransformChangeEvent.Reason CRS_CHANGE
      A new value has been automatically computed for preserving the viewing area after a change of CRS. It typically happens when the user changes the map projection without moving to a different region.
      See Also:
      • Canvas​.set­Objective­CRS(Coordinate­Reference­System, Direct­Position)

    • ASSIGNMENT

      public static final TransformChangeEvent.Reason ASSIGNMENT
      A new value has been assigned, overwriting the previous values. The objective CRS has not changed. It can be considered as a kind of navigation, moving to absolute coordinates and zoom levels.
      See Also:
      • Canvas​.set­Objective­To­Display(Linear­Transform)

    • OBJECTIVE_NAVIGATION

      public static final TransformChangeEvent.Reason OBJECTIVE_NAVIGATION
      A relative change has been applied in units of the objective CRS (for example in metres).
      See Also:
      • Planar­Canvas​.transform­Objective­Coordinates(Affine­Transform)

    • DISPLAY_NAVIGATION

      public static final TransformChangeEvent.Reason DISPLAY_NAVIGATION
      A relative change has been applied in units of display device (typically pixel units).
      See Also:
      • Planar­Canvas​.transform­Display­Coordinates(Affine­Transform)

    • INTERIM

      public static final TransformChangeEvent.Reason INTERIM
      A relative interim change has been applied but is not yet reflected in the "objective to display" transform. This kind of change is not fired by Planar­Canvas but may be fired by subclasses such as Map­Canvas. That class provides immediate feedback to users with a temporary visual change before to perform more expensive rendering in background.
